title: Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800
medium:
Pen and black ink, wash
Support: off-white laid paper
markings: Stamps: Verso: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
inscribed: Verso, in pen and brown ink: No. 2 [?]; volendo far il preste disegno di diamanti/ ci vuole circa 300
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800.
1775–1800. Pen and black ink, wash
Support: off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-839.
